StringProperty.Name: OutDir
StringProperty.Description: Specifies a relative path to the output file directory; can include environment variables.

StringProperty.Name: IntDir
StringProperty.Description: Specifies a relative path to the intermediate file directory; can include environment variables.

EnumProperty.Name: CLRSupport
EnumProperty.Description: Select the Common Language Runtime support your code uses.

EnumValue.Name: true
EnumValue.Description: Creates metadata for your application that can be consumed by other CLR applications, and allows your application to consume types and data in the metadata of other CLR components.

EnumValue.Name: Pure
EnumValue.DisplayName: Pure MSIL Common Language RunTime Support
EnumValue.Description: Produces an MSIL-only output file with no native executable code, although it can contain native types compiled to MSIL.

EnumValue.Name: Safe
EnumValue.DisplayName: Safe MSIL Common Language RunTime Support
EnumValue.Description: Produces an MSIL-only (no native executable code) and verifiable output file.

StringProperty.Name: BuildLogFile
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the build log file to write to when build logging is enabled.

StringProperty.Name: _ProjectFileVersion
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the version of the conversion tool used to create this project file.
